ratings.comment: Nice professor! Just make sure you read all her lecture notes.
For the material of this course, no sample exam or any key point review session for the final. We ask her several time if she would provide something to study for, she said NO

Guanming's lecture slide is not equally spread throughout the semester, Her slides are poorly organized, it just have some key points, she just write all over the slides. For the material of this course, no sample exam or any key point review session for the final. We ask her several time if she would provide something to study for, she said NO
